Reference

All functions

anchor_features()

Find integration anchors and set variable features

boxplot_paired_points()

Plot Paired Gene Expression with Links and Faceting

clustering()

Automated parameter sweep for Seurat clustering

cnmf_bar_plots()

Plot Top N Usage Columns From cNMF Gene Spectra

cnmf_gene_ranks()

Search Gene Ranks Across cNMF Programs

cnmf_top_programs()

Add top cNMF programs to Seurat metadata with usage cutoff

cnmf_umaps()

Plot UMAP Usage Maps From cNMF Usage Matrix

combine_stacked_bars()

Combine a List of Cluster Distribution Plots

compare_cnmf_programs()

Compare Overlap Between Two cNMF Program Sets

density_plot()

Generate Python Code for Scanpy UMAP Density Plots

dimplots_split()

Save Split DimPlots from a Seurat Object

dotplots_pdf()

Generate DotPlot PDFs for a Seurat Object

dotplots_png()

Generate and save a Seurat DotPlot dynamically

double_volcano()

Generate 2D Log2 Fold-Change Comparison Plots Between Identity Pairs

export_top_pc_genes()

Export top genes per principal component

features_plots()

Plot Features with Dynamic Layout and Cutoffs

filter_genes_by_expression()

Filter Genes by Minimum Cell Expression

heatmap_cell_level()

Generate Clustered Heatmap for Seurat Object

heatmap_meta()

Generate Cell-Type-Level Expression Heatmap

heatmap_pseudobulk()

Generate Patient-Level Expression Heatmap with Z-scores

optimize_single_cell()

Optimize Single Cell RNA-seq Analysis

plot_mean_variance()

Plot mean-variance relationship with feature highlighting

prepare_h5ad()

Prepare a Seurat Object for Export to AnnData (.h5ad)

preprocess_obj()

Preprocess Seurat Object.

remove_low_quality_clusters()

Remove low-quality clusters based on feature count thresholds

select_PCs()

Select principal components based on variance explained

select_marker_genes_score()

Select marker genes based on product score

setup_python()

Set up Python environment for BioYourOwnBowl

stacked_bar_plots()

Plot Cluster Distribution Across Metadata Layers

tcr_treemaps()

Generate Treemaps of TCR Clonotypes for Selected Epitopes

venn_plots()

Create Venn Diagram from Differential Expression Comparisons

violin_plots()

Create Violin Plot with Boxplot and Dotplot Overlay

volcano_plots()

Create Volcano Plot from Differential Expression Analysis
